mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.laoshi_id as laoshiId ,a.qingjia_name as qingjiaName ,a.qingjia_text as qingjiaText ,a.qingjia_types as qingjiaTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.qingjia_time as qingjiaTime ,a.qingjia_number as qingjiaNumber ,a.qingjia_yesno_types as qingjiaYesnoTypes ,a.qingjia_yesno_text as qingjiaYesnoText ,a.qingjia_shenhe_time as qingjiaShenheTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,laoshi.laoshi_uuid_number as laoshiUuidNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number as yonghuUuidNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM qingjia a left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and ( a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} )
and a.qingjia_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.qingjiaName},'%')
and a.qingjia_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.qingjiaText},'%')
and a.qingjia_types = #{params.qingjiaTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.insert_time = #{params.insertTime}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaTimeEnd})
and a.qingjia_time = #{params.qingjiaTime}
and a.qingjia_number >= #{params.qingjiaNumberStart}
and a.qingjia_number <= #{params.qingjiaNumberEnd}
and a.qingjia_number = #{params.qingjiaNumber}
and a.qingjia_yesno_types = #{params.qingjiaYesnoTypes}
and a.qingjia_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.qingjiaYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_shenhe_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaShenheTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.qingjia_shenhe_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.qingjiaShenheTimeEnd})
and a.qingjia_shenhe_time = #{params.qingjiaShenheTime}
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.laoshi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiUuidNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuUuidNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
